title: PSK-TLS Server Requirements
response:
Feedback Summary (2 comments):

General Comments:
1. increase more TLS algo, including NULL SHA for easy handshake test
2. add negative case handler such as : connection interruption, mismatched TLS PSK between uicc and server, handshake interruption by jitter on other means

comments.comment: increase more TLS algo, including NULL SHA for easy handshake test
add negative case handler such as : connection interruption, mismatched TLS PSK between uicc and server, handshake interruption by jitter on other means
